meanings.definition: A soft white clay-like mineral used for carving pipes.
meanings.sent1: The artisan carefully carved the meerschaum into a beautiful pipe.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather's favorite pipe was made of meerschaum.
meanings.sent3: The meerschaum pipe seemed to whisper secrets to those who smoked it.
meanings.sent4: Her meerschaum pipe was a symbol of elegance and sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The meerschaum gleamed in the sunlight, a work of art in clay.

meanings.sent1: He enjoyed smoking his meerschaum after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The meerschaum was smooth and cool to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The meerschaum pipe was his constant companion, always by his side.
meanings.sent4: The meerschaum pipe puffed out fragrant smoke rings.
meanings.sent5: The meerschaum pipe was a cherished possession, passed down through generations.

meanings.sent1: The intricate meerschaum design on the pipe was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: She admired the meerschaum craftsmanship of the pipe.
meanings.sent3: The meerschaum carving had a mischievous grin, as if alive.
meanings.sent4: The meerschaum artistry transformed the pipe into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The meerschaum details were so delicate, like lace in stone.
